description: Learn the basics of data science, including data wrangling, exploratory data analysis, and machine learning.
curriculum: Data Wrangling, Exploratory Data Analysis, Machine Learning Basics

description: A comprehensive introduction to Python programming, covering variables, control structures, and functions.
curriculum: Variables, Control Structures, Functions, Data Structures

description: Understand core machine learning algorithms, including linear regression, decision trees, and SVMs.
curriculum: Linear Regression, Decision Trees, SVM, Evaluation Metrics

description: Dive into deep learning using TensorFlow and Keras, covering neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs.
curriculum: Neural Networks, CNN, RNN, TensorFlow Basics

description: An in-depth guide to statistics used in data science, such as hypothesis testing, probability, and statistical modeling.
Learn how to visualize data using libraries like Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly.
Master SQL for data analysis, focusing on querying databases, joins, and data aggregation.
curriculum: SQL Basics, Joins, Aggregation, Database Optimization

description: Explore NLP techniques like tokenization, sentiment analysis, and text classification.
curriculum: Tokenization, Sentiment Analysis, Text Classification, Word Embeddings

description: Get started with big data tools and techniques, including Hadoop, Spark, and distributed computing.
curriculum: Hadoop, Spark, Distributed Computing, Big Data Basics

description: Study ethical considerations in AI, such as bias, fairness, and accountability in machine learning systems.
curriculum: Bias in AI, Fairness, Accountability, Ethical Principles
